thread.title: INVESTOR ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. of Commencement of an Investigation Regarding the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Francisco Partners Management - Yahoo Finance
thread.title_full: INVESTOR ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. of Commencement of an Investigation Regarding the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Francisco Partners Management - Yahoo Finance

author: Levi & Korsinsky
title: INVESTOR ALERT: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP Notifies Shareholders of ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. of Commencement of an Investigation Regarding the Fairness of the Sale of the Company to Francisco Partners Management - Yahoo Finance
text:
NEW YORK--(BUSINESS WIRE)--
The following statement is being issued by Levi & Korsinsky, LLP: 
To: All Persons or Entities who purchased ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. stock prior to April 30, 2015 . 
You are hereby notified that Levi & Korsinsky, LLP has commenced an investigation into the fairness of the sale of ClickSoftware Technologies Ltd. ( CKSW ) to Francisco Partners Management for $12.65 per share. To learn more about the investigation and your rights, go to : 
HTTP://ZLK.9NL.COM/CLICKSOFTWARE 
or contact Joseph E. Levi, Esq. either via email at jlevi@zlk.com or by telephone at (212) 363-7500, toll-free: (877) 363-5972. There is no cost or obligation to you . 
Levi & Korsinsky is a national firm with offices in New York, New Jersey, Connecticut and Washington D.C. The firmâ€™s attorneys have extensive expertise in prosecuting securities litigation involving financial fraud, representing investors throughout the nation in securities lawsuits and have recovered hundreds of millions of dollars for aggrieved shareholders . For more information, please feel free to contact any of the attorneys listed below. Attorney advertising. Prior results do not guarantee similar outcomes. 

Company Legal & Law Matters LLP Contact: Levi & Korsinsky, LLP
Joseph Levi, Esq.
